title: List of all Android database  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android database  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Android-Debug-Database
repoList.description: A library for debugging android databases and shared preferences - Make Debugging Great Again

repoList.name: LitePal
repoList.description: An Android library that makes developers use SQLite database extremely easy.

repoList.name: android_dbinspector
repoList.description: Android library for viewing and sharing in app databases.

repoList.name: DBFlow
repoList.description: A blazing fast, powerful, and very simple ORM android database library that writes database code for you.

repoList.name: squidb
repoList.description: SquiDB is a SQLite database library for Android and iOS

repoList.name: hyperlog-android
repoList.description: Utility logger library for storing logs into database and push them to remote server for debugging

repoList.name: RoomDatabase
repoList.description: Android Architecture Component - Room Persistency Library example

repoList.name: room-persistence-sample
repoList.description: Implementation of Room Persistence Library

repoList.name: sprinkles
repoList.description: Sprinkles is a boiler-plate-reduction-library for dealing with databases in android applications
